FeatureItem.Name: General
FeatureItem.Description:
Placeholders allow end-users to create template documents, which then can be filled with required data, e.g., from a database. Populate the Placeholders collection with items that will be available for end-users.
To replace placeholder values with the required replacements, use the client-side [{lnk_#AspNet/DevExpressWebASPxHtmlEditorScriptsASPxClientHtmlEditor_ReplacePlaceholderstopic}ReplacePlaceholders] or the server-side [{lnk_#AspNet/DevExpressWebASPxHtmlEditorASPxHtmlEditor_ReplacePlaceholderstopic}ReplacePlaceholders] method.
